item.title: CocoaPods Hello Triangle
item.description: As of release 1.8.0, you can install Filament in your iOS application using CocoaPods. This guide will walk you through creating a basic “hello triangle” iOS application using Filament and the Metal backend. The full source for this example is here. If you’re just looking to get something up and running quickly, download the project, pod install, build, and run. We’ll be walking through 7 steps to get the rotating triangle up and running.
